casebody.data:
No. 10-9360. Graydon Earl Comstock, Jr. and Thomas Matherly, Petitioners v. United States. 564 U.S. 1030, 131 S. Ct. 3026,

180 L. Ed. 2d 865,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4673. June 20, 2011.

Petition for writ of cer-tiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 627 F.3d 513.
